directions: Place the cake in a glass serving bowl and cover with the canned fruit.  Prepare gelatin according to package instructions and pour over fruit and cake.
Combine custard powder and sugar in a small saucepan over medium heat.  Stir in milk and cook until thick and creamy.  Pour over sponge cake mixture.  Chill until set.
ingredients: 1 (10 inch) sponge cake, cut in cubes
1 (3 ounce) package port wine flavored gelatin mix
title: Australian English Trifle
